title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Border Policy
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 12 February 2021.
content:
The UK government are clearly content to continue lurching from one crisis to another when it comes to border policy.
